game.name: Rodent Company
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Battle enemy pests using randomly generated toy guns, powerful perks and unique abilities! Join with up to 4 friends in local co-op and gather the best arsenal to win!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Battle enemy pests using randomly generated toy guns, powerful perks and unique abilities! Join with up to 4 friends in local co-op and gather the best arsenal to win!
